p.d:
IRC Client Class suitable for both client or bots applications. Features are: - Supprts Multiple Server connections - Non-blocking sockets - Runs on Standard PHP installation without any Extensions - Server messages handled by a callback system - Full logging capabilities - Full statistic collector
Note: Net_IRC is no longer actively maintained. Please see Net_SmartIRC (http://pear.php.net/Net_SmartIRC)
